alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:16AM EDT until April 01 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM EDT FOR TRUMBULL COUNTY... At 316 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Ashtabula to near Burton to near Tallmadge, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Warren, Niles, Hubbard, Cortland, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Kinsman, North Bloomfield, West Farmington, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Bristolville, Leavittsburg, Maplewood Park, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Mecca, Johnston and Orangeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
